request:
improve GoTo handling for paths that only exist in one viewer

- Detect which viewer(s) contain an ID-based path during conversion
- Use the appropriate viewer prefix based on where the path exists
- Only expand in viewers that actually have the path
- Better handling of added/removed nodes that only exist in one panel

This fixes GoTo navigation for diffs where the path only exists in one viewer.
testSteps: 2. Wait for differences to be calculated
5. Verify navigation to correct JSON node
6. Verify node is expanded and highlighted
expectedResult: The reported issue should be completely resolved without introducing new bugs or breaking existing functionality.

verificationCommand: npm run test && npm run test:e2e
